WorkItem.ClosedComment: Display issue with Sorting. Code checked, nothing wrong there.
WorkItem.Description: There is still an option for T5 2pc set bonus in here. It is also enabled by default. I really don't think a whole lot of priests are concerned with GH giving 100 mana back. Is there any reason it is still in the code? If there is, could this option be set to zero by default.

Comments.Message: If you don't have the set bonus it doesn't do anything. Its still there because if I removed it I'm sure someone would complain it was removed. (Or to be honest, I keep it there in case I need a slider in the future, and until then it can just be there)
Interesting... because when I move the slider I can see gear moving on the right hand side. If it doesn't do anything why does it effect the gear comparison?
I am unable to reproduce this effect here. Tried with both Holy and Disc spec, and i also doublechecked code, only place that slider is used, is when you got the T5 2pc bonus.
It would help me a lot if you could post your character.xml file as an attachment to this.
By gear moving, do you mean they actually change in value or is it 3 items with value 5 just swapping places?

Hmm... after looking more carefully it appears it is only the Horde/Alli versions of the same item switching places.That's not a big deal, that bonus is now worth so very little it must not make any difference,
